A blog about making things

Hello,

Since I'm a kid I love to build things. But I barely keep a trace of what I've been doing.

This place is here for that. Keeping a trace of what I've been doing. And it could be useful for other people, its even better ;-).

On the homepage, you can find the list of projects I will work on in 2018.

Cheers, Ruben
